#include<iostream>
#include<fstream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<cstring>
#include<map>
#define in cin
#define out cout
using namespace std;
const int Nmax = 100001;
int main(){
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    ifstream in("test.in");
    ofstream out("test.out");
    #endif
    int t,k; in>>t;
    string s;
    while(t--){
        in>>s>>k;
        int m=0;
        for(int i=0;i<s.size();i++) m=(m*10+int(s[i])-'0')%k;
        if(m==0) out<<"YES\n";
        else out<<"NO\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
